A bird's egg can be obtained from a bird nest that falls out of a tree while Woodcutting or as loot from Bird house trapping. They can come in three different colours: green, blue, and red which represent the colours of Guthix, Saradomin, and Zamorak, respectively.

These eggs can be offered to the shrine in the Woodcutting Guild to receive 100 Prayer experience and a Bird nest with seeds as a reward. There is a 1/300 chance of obtaining a piece of the evil chicken outfit when offering eggs, with each piece having a 1/1200 chance individually. Before this update, the eggs had no use.[1]

Considering the value of the nest from the shrine, the value of all pieces of the evil chicken outfit, and the chance of obtaining one of these pieces, the average value of one egg is 12,471.

The chances of getting a bird nest from a tree is 1/256 when chopping any type of tree. When a player receives a nest, the chance of the nest containing a bird's egg is 3/100 (each colour egg being 1/100). When wearing a strung rabbit foot the chances are increased slightly to 3/95[2] by decreasing the chance of getting seeds.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 March 2021
(update)

There is now a small chance of receiving bird's egg nests when emptying a full birdhouse.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 11 May 2020. (Archived from the original on 24 Aug 2020.) Mod Ash: "The head is 1/1200. The wings are 1/1200. The legs are 1/1200. The feet are 1/1200. Thus the chance of getting an outfit piece is 1/300."
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 26 October 2018. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "If you've got the rabbit foot necklace, pick number 0-94 inclusive. Otherwise, pick number 0-99 inclusive. 0 = red egg, 1 = blue egg, 2 = green egg, 3-34 = ring, otherwise it's seeds."

A '''bird's egg''' can be obtained from a [[bird nest]] that falls out of a tree while [[Woodcutting]] or as loot from [[Bird house trapping]]. They can come in three different colours: green, blue, and red which represent the colours of [[Guthix]], [[Saradomin]], and [[Zamorak]], respectively.

These eggs can be offered to the [[shrine]] in the [[Woodcutting Guild]] to receive 100 [[Prayer]] [[experience]] and a [[Bird nest]] with seeds as a reward. There is a 1/300 chance of obtaining a piece of the [[evil chicken outfit]] when offering eggs, with each piece having a 1/1200 chance individually. Before this update, the eggs had no use.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1259915895343890434|date=11 May 2020|archiveurl=http://archive.md/Rs2eU|archivedate=24 Aug 2020|quote=The head is 1/1200. The wings are 1/1200. The legs are 1/1200. The feet are 1/1200. Thus the chance of getting an outfit piece is 1/300.}}

Considering the value of the nest from the shrine, the value of all pieces of the evil chicken outfit, and the chance of obtaining one of these pieces, the average value of one egg is {{Coins|floor(1/4 * 1/300 * ({{GEP|Evil chicken head}} + {{GEP|Evil chicken wings}} + {{GEP|Evil chicken legs}} + {{GEP|Evil chicken feet}} )+{{GEP|Bird nest (empty)}}+({{GEP|Acorn|.204192180876119}}+{{GEP|Willow seed|.135421573245407}}+{{GEP|Maple seed|.0442769665567593}}+{{GEP|Yew seed|.0317946302402261}}+{{GEP|Magic seed|.00376825247291569}}+{{GEP|Apple tree seed|.171691003297221}}+{{GEP|Banana tree seed|.104804521902968}}+{{GEP|Orange tree seed|.0833725859632595}}+{{GEP|Curry tree seed|.0675930287329251}}+{{GEP|Pineapple seed|.0442769665567593}}+{{GEP|Papaya tree seed|.0367404616109279}}+{{GEP|Palm tree seed|.0226095148374941}}+{{GEP|Dragonfruit tree seed|.00612341026848799}}+{{GEP|Teak seed|.00447479981158738}}+{{GEP|Mahogany seed|.00400376825247292}}+{{GEP|Calquat tree seed|.0157795572303344}}+{{GEP|Celastrus seed|.00329722091380122}}+{{GEP|Redwood tree seed|.00259067357512953}}))}}.

The chances of getting a bird nest from a tree is 1/256 when chopping any type of tree. When a player receives a nest, the chance of the nest containing a bird's egg is 3/100 (each colour egg being 1/100). When wearing a [[strung rabbit foot]] the chances are increased slightly to 3/95{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1055815273763217414|date=26 October 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/B74zS|archivedate=26 May 2020|quote=If you've got the rabbit foot necklace, pick number 0-94 inclusive. Otherwise, pick number 0-99 inclusive. 0 = red egg, 1 = blue egg, 2 = green egg, 3-34 = ring, otherwise it's seeds.}} by decreasing the chance of getting seeds.
